rows.label: qev019101_MSG0001
rows.name: Can this contraption truly yield ore harder than steel?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0002
rows.name:
These alien technologies are indeed most strange and
wondrous...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ho! You there! Do you know of this material known as
"mere-rain-ium"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0004
rows.name:
A Ma-non spoke of it. She claimed it was an ore of
uncommon properties and unparalleled usefulness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev019101_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Go Sirho all you know about miranium.

rows.label: qev019101_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev019101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Go Sirho what miranium can be used for.

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0005
rows.name:
I see. You are most knowledgeable. I had not expected
this mere-rain-ium to have so many uses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0006
rows.name: I see now why Six Stars is so desperate to acquire it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0007
rows.name:
I know little of it myself, having only first seen it after
coming to this fair city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0008
rows.name:
I am told it can be rendered harder than steel,
or as flexible as a spring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0009
rows.name:
The Ma-non have even developed a means to use it as
a kind of fuel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0010
rows.name:
As an artisan myself, I am deeply curious, and wish to
explore these processes I have heard tell of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0011
rows.name:
You BLADEs gather this mere-rain-ium for any who
desire it. Is this not so?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0012
rows.name:
I require no more than 10,000 units at most.
Will you honor me with your assistance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0013
rows.name:
If I can learn to manipulate this substance, I am certain
I can offer the city powerful products conceivable only
by the mind of a Wrothian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0014
rows.name:
While you are away I shall continue my study of
this...mere-rain-ium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0015
rows.name:
By my name and honor, I shall not allow the materials
your labor earns to go to waste![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0016
rows.name:
For one outside the established industry such as myself,
my only recourse is to rely on BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0017
rows.name:
I beseech you for 10,000 units of mere-rain-ium,
and swear it shall not go to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0018
rows.name:
You are returned, [ST:playername ]!
How did your hunt fare?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0019
rows.name:
While you were gone, I learned much from a wise and
generous human called Kirsty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_JNK0030
rows.name: Deliver

rows.label: qev019101_SEL0031
rows.name: Hand over 10,000 units of miranium.

rows.label: qev019101_JNK0040
rows.name: Keep

rows.label: qev019101_SEL0041
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0020
rows.name: Such a bounty of mere-rain-ium![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0021
rows.name: And did you acquire this using your Front Ear Nav?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0022
rows.name: Kirsty made mention of such a thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0023
rows.name:
When I showed interest, she was kind enough to give
me a data probe suitable for novices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0024
rows.name:
I would like to make use of this gift, but...
Are you familiar with its workings?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev019101_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Go Sirho that you know all about data probes.

rows.label: qev019101_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev019101_SEL0061
rows.name: Shake your head and look around nervously.

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0025
rows.name:
You BLADEs are quite reliable. I fear that even after
hearing an explanation of its mysteries, I was unable
to grasp them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0026
rows.name:
If it be no insult to you, I would trouble you to teach
me such things yet once more. Perhaps with a practical
demonstration in the wild? [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0027
rows.name:
When I mentioned your name, Kirsty affirmed that you
were a most proficient student.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0028
rows.name:
Such modesty is wasted here. Please, you must show
me how to make use of this data probe.
Perhaps with a practical demonstration in the wild?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0029
rows.name:
My mere-rain-ium needs are met, yet I do not wish to
be dependent upon you indefinitely—we Wrothians
value self-sufficiency above nearly all else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0030
rows.name:
I will await you in Oblivia. Please come once you have
made preparations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0031
rows.name:
I see. Then I ask you to inform me once you have
found said mere-rain-ium. Many thanks, hunter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0032
rows.name:
Ah, you have come! Now then, if I remember correctly,
I am to stab this data probe into the ground, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0033
rows.name:
But after that, Kirsty's teachings are a blur—so you will
need demonstrate the rest with all haste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0034
rows.name:
I ask that you be as thorough as you can. I am not
accustomed to dealing with such machines, and their
workings elude me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_JNK0070
rows.name: Teach

rows.label: qev019101_SEL0071
rows.name: Show Go Sirho everything, step by painful step.

rows.label: qev019101_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev019101_SEL0081
rows.name:
Tell Go Sirho she'll never learn unless
she teaches herself.

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0035
rows.name: Ah, I see. So this part goes here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0036
rows.name: No? Then it is installed like this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0037
rows.name:
Not that either? Then how DOES this thrice-damned
contraption work?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0038
rows.name:
Bah! ENOUGH! I've had it with this stubborn device.
Take this! Hiiiyaaa!!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0039
rows.name:
A fair point. For when learning the sword, one must
always begin by holding the blade for oneself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0040
rows.name: Very well. I shall take this part and place it here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0041
rows.name: This goes...we'll say, here. And I press this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0042
rows.name: Ha! Are you duly impressed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0043
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0044
rows.name: Where did I go wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0045
rows.name:
I will grant that perhaps my handling was a bit rough,
but surely...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0046
rows.name:
No. I will make no excuse. I must swallow my pride
and petition that you ask Kirsty for another data probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0047
rows.name:
I swear on my name that this error shall not be
repeated![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0048
rows.name:
Was I too forceful? I did not anticipate the device to be
quite so...fragile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0049
rows.name:
I shall not repeat this error. Kindly go ask Kirsty for
another datum probe, that I might use it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0050
rows.name: Well, hunter? Did you receive another data probe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0051
rows.name:
This time I shall install it without fail.
I ask that you hand me said device.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0052
rows.name:
Fear not. After my last attempt, I have grasped the
process, and remember most of the instructions quite
distinctly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0053
rows.name:
I ask only for any advice you might offer. For example,
what is in your mind when you install these devices?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_JNK0090
rows.name: Others

rows.label: qev019101_SEL0091
rows.name:
Tell Go Sirho that you think of how
it will aid the future of humankind.

rows.label: qev019101_JNK0100
rows.name: Myself

rows.label: qev019101_SEL0101
rows.name:
Tell Go Sirho that you think about
all the credits you will earn.

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0054
rows.name:
You bear a great weight upon your shoulders.
...I feel the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0055
rows.name:
Even now, I study these devices to ease the plight of my
fellow Wrothians who toil in poverty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0056
rows.name:
...Yes. As long as I remain focused on that goal,
I am unlikely to be careless enough to break the device.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0057
rows.name:
I thank you. I will attempt it again now with that firmly
in mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0058
rows.name: Is your Front Ear Nav truly so lucrative?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0059
rows.name:
Then let it bring me the funds to erect a mighty
workshop and attain great success![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0060
rows.name:
For I hope one day to ransom my fellow Wrothians
from the skeletal clutches of poverty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0061
rows.name:
Watch on, then, as I lay the cornerstone of the
Wrothians' new and glorious future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0062
rows.name:
...Ha ha ha! Excellent! It is done!
And now to receive mere-rain-ium![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0063
rows.name:
I thank you, [ST:playername ]! From this day
forth, I will expand your Front Ear Nav across the
farthest reaches of Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0064
rows.name:
Then the Wrothians will prosper as you BLADEs
have prospered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0065
rows.name:
Now to return and explore what can be crafted from
this mere-rain-ium...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0066
rows.name:
I give you my word—I will create something uniquely
Wrothian that will bring wealth to both our peoples.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019101_MSG0067
rows.name:
I shall see that all you have taught me and all you have
done is not put to waste![ST:wait ]
